name: Cluck Cluck Boom #1Gam March 2016
description:
You play a farmer who must defend his barn from a horde of explosive Roosters! Using a variety of tools, such as bales of hay, pitchforks and exploding bags of fertilizer. Protect the barn at all costs,it can only take 3 hits. Try to get combo kills for bonus scoring.

Controls:

WASD - Player movement
Space - use weapon.

Audio sources:

Main Theme : - Country Boy : http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/country-boy
Chicken Sound Effectt: http://www.freesound.org/people/Rudmer_Rotteveel/sounds/316921/
chicken "Talking" http://www.freesound.org/people/SquaredGlasses/sounds/253649/
Explosion - http://www.freesound.org/people/cydon/sounds/268557/
